compare:analyze.description: Generates stdout report from the "tracerbench compare" command output, 'compare.json'

fidelity.name: fidelity
fidelity.description: Directly correlates to the number of samples per trace. eg. test,low,medium,high OR any number between 2-100

regressionThreshold.name: regressionThreshold
regressionThreshold.description: The upper limit the experiment can regress slower in milliseconds. eg 50

isCIEnv.name: isCIEnv
isCIEnv.description: Provides a drastically slimmed down stdout report for CI workflows. However does NOT hide analysis.

regressionThresholdStat.name: regressionThresholdStat
regressionThresholdStat.description: The statistic which the regression threshold runs against.

jsonReport.name: jsonReport
jsonReport.description: Include a JSON file from the stdout report

args.name: resultsFile
args.description: The "tracerbench compare" command json output file

compare.description: Compare the performance delta between an experiment and control

hideAnalysis.name: hideAnalysis
hideAnalysis.description: Hide the the analysis output in terminal

browserArgs.name: browserArgs
browserArgs.description: (Default Recommended) Additional chrome flags for the TracerBench render benchmark. TracerBench includes many non-configurable defaults in this category.

fidelity.name: fidelity
fidelity.description: Directly correlates to the number of samples per trace. eg. test,low,medium,high OR any number between 2-100

tbResultsFolder.name: tbResultsFolder
tbResultsFolder.description: The output folder path for all tracerbench results

controlURL.name: controlURL
controlURL.description: Control URL to visit for compare command

experimentURL.name: experimentURL
experimentURL.description: Experiment URL to visit for compare command

emulateDevice.name: emulateDevice
emulateDevice.description: Emulate a mobile device screen size.

emulateDeviceOrientation.name: emulateDeviceOrientation
emulateDeviceOrientation.description: Expected to be either "vertical" or "horizontal". Dictates orientation of device screen.

socksPorts.name: socksPorts
socksPorts.description: Specify a socks proxy port as browser option for control and experiment

regressionThreshold.name: regressionThreshold
regressionThreshold.description: The upper limit the experiment can regress slower in milliseconds. eg 50

sampleTimeout.name: sampleTimeout
sampleTimeout.description: The number of seconds to wait for a sample.

config.name: config
config.description: Specify an alternative directory rather than the project root for the tbconfig.json. This explicit config will overwrite all.

runtimeStats.name: runtimeStats
runtimeStats.description: Compare command output deep-dive stats during run.

report.name: report
report.description: Generate a PDF report directly after running the compare command.

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Debug flag per command. Will output noisy command

isCIEnv.description: Provides a drastically slimmed down stdout report for CI workflows. However does NOT hide analysis.

regressionThresholdStat.description: The statistic which the regression threshold runs against.
